title: swarm of fails in datalad/git-annex master branch testing
body:
see https://github.com/datalad/git-annex/runs/2881114114?check_suite_focus=true  not yet sure what/why since we were green for https://github.com/datalad/datalad/pull/5691 PR

<details>
<summary>partial extract</summary> 

```shell
======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.support.tests.test_external_versions.test_external_versions_rogue_module
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 739, in _wrap_with_tempfile
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/support/tests/test_external_versions.py", line 141, in test_external_versions_rogue_module
    assert_in('pickaboo', cml.out)
Warning: Error: 'pickaboo' not found in '[WARNING] Failed to import module verycustomrogue__ due to \n'
-------------------- >> begin captured logging << --------------------
datalad: WARNING: Failed to import module verycustomrogue__ due to 
--------------------- >> end captured logging << ---------------------

======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.support.tests.test_github_.test__make_github_repos
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/support/tests/test_github_.py", line 113, in test__make_github_repos
    assert_in('Failed to create repository while using token 1to...: very bad status', cml.out)
Warning: Error: 'Failed to create repository while using token 1to...: very bad status' not found in '[WARNING] Failed to create repository while using token 1to...: \n'
-------------------- >> begin captured logging << --------------------
datalad.support.github_: WARNING: Failed to create repository while using token 1to...: 
--------------------- >> end captured logging << ---------------------

======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.support.tests.test_sshconnector.test_ssh_manager_close_no_throw
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 739, in _wrap_with_tempfile
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/support/tests/test_sshconnector.py", line 202, in test_ssh_manager_close_no_throw
    assert_in('Failed to close a connection: oh I am so bad', cml.out)
AssertionError: 'Failed to close a connection: oh I am so bad' not found in '[DEBUG] Closing 1 SSH connections...\n[DEBUG] Failed to close a connection: \n'
-------------------- >> begin captured logging << --------------------
datalad.support.sshconnector: DEBUG: Closing 1 SSH connections...
datalad.support.sshconnector: DEBUG: Failed to close a connection: 
--------------------- >> end captured logging << ---------------------

======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.tests.test_utils.test_import_modules_fail
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/tests/test_utils.py", line 1098, in test_import_modules_fail
    ok_startswith(failures[0], "Fail datalad.bogus: No module")
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 435, in ok_startswith
    msg="String %r doesn't start with %r" % (s, prefix))
AssertionError: String 'Fail datalad.bogus: ' doesn't start with 'Fail datalad.bogus: No module'

```
</details>

full logs could be found on smaug:/mnt/datasets/datalad/ci/git-annex/builds/2021/06/cron-20210622/build-ubuntu.yaml-317-a1f634dc-failed and I also see lots of hits for the 'pickaboo' in the logs for #5691:

```shell
(tinuous-dev) datalad@smaug:/mnt/datasets/datalad/ci/logs/2021/06/08/pr/5691$ git grep 'pickaboo'
```

so I guess it was not that clean
